Texts.Eng: My crew and I were mining asteroids until we discovered a Thell ship in the neighbourhood. In their hurry, my crew forgot to pick me up, and I've been stuck here ever since... ^green;Could you get me an ^orange;Avikan Transmitter ^green;so I can call my crew for a pick up?
Thank you for bringing me this, now I can contact my crew and arrange for a pick up! Here, take this extra helmet I had lying around, you've earned it!
